titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd on the late day of thanksgiving, Decemb. 2, 1697 by John Howe ... ; to which is prefixed Dr. Bates's congratulatory speech to the King, Novemb. 22, 1697, in the name of the dissenting ministers in and about London.
titleStmt.author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.
Bates, William, 1625-1699. Congratulatory speech to the King, Novemb. 22, 1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Bridge ... for Tho. Parkhurst ...,
